title: Achieved performances of this paper

definitions.Full Dataset: The complete set of data used in the study
definitions.GPU Memory: The amount of memory available on a Graphics Processing Unit

formulas: Test Accuracy (%) = Function of Image Per Class (IPC)
summary: The slide presents a graph showing the relationship between test accuracy and image per class (IPC) for different models and configurations. It also includes a table comparing the speedup of NCFM and DATM across different IPC values.
